Pre-Game Insights: The Orioles will join Major League Baseball in honoring children and survivors affected by pediatric cancer on Childhood Cancer Awareness Day.
The Orioles will recognize CLYDE, an 8-year-old from Severna Park, who is battling two types of cancer, as their Birdland Community Hero.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Orioles will donate tickets to the families of children who are currently being treated for cancer and who participated in the 2024 Maryland Trek.
A pediatric cancer patient from Hyundai Hope on Wheels will throw out the ceremonial first pitch prior to the game.
Others: The Camden Franks will compete against one another live at Oriole Park in a Hot Dog Race.
The Orioles will host an online auction featuring game-used memorabilia to benefit Just Power in Kids.
